## Functions

### unifyExtensionMD() {#afe1326abb7803c9088d08b7348c8b5e6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AMDGPUUnifyMetadata.cpp&#125;::unifyExtensionMD (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name)</>}>
Unify version metadata.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if changes are made. Assume the named metadata has operands each of which is a list e.g. !Name = &#123;!n1, !n2&#125; !n1 = !&#123;!&quot;cl&#95;khr&#95;fp16&quot;, &#123;!&quot;cl&#95;khr&#95;fp64&quot;&#125;&#125; !n2 = !&#123;!&quot;cl&#95;khr&#95;image&quot;&#125; Combine it into a single list with unique operands.
</SectionUser>

### unifyVersionMD() {#a42808949a508a2f6e635b6ae584adcd5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AMDGPUUnifyMetadata.cpp&#125;::unifyVersionMD (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, bool PickFirst)</>}>
Unify version metadata.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if changes are made. Assume the named metadata has operands each of which is a pair of integer constant, e.g. !Name = &#123;!n1, !n2&#125; !n1 = &#123;i32 1, i32 2&#125; !n2 = &#123;i32 2, i32 0&#125; Keep the largest version as the sole operand if PickFirst is false. Otherwise pick it from the first value, representing kernel module.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuunifymetadata-cpp/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuunifymetadata-cpp">AMDGPUUnifyMetadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
